<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in -odac -iadc ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o loopsegp.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments> sr=44100 ksmps=1 nchnls=2
; By Mark Van Peteghem 2008
instr 1 iphase = p4
kenv linen 1, 0.1, p3, 0.1 kph_amp phasor 2, 0 kamp loopsegp kph_amp, 60, 1, 30, 1, 60 kamp = ampdb(kamp)*kenv
kph_freq phasor 2, iphase klow_freq line 200, p3, 100 kfreq loopsegp kph_freq, 400, 1, klow_freq, 1, 400
asig vco2 kamp, kfreq, 2, 0.5
outs asig, asig
endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore> i1 0 3 0 i1 + . 0.50 </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
